root: ^I forgot to tell Royce about the shipment I need.
^No, no. I can't hope for that. I'll have to wait until next week again.
^Yes, but not enough for you to worry. I'll take care of it.
^Tara runs the shop with you, doesn't she?
^She does, I do try to let her enjoy her own life sometimes. Can't possibly have her holed up in that stuffy shop.
^Oh... I should tell her to water the flowers in front. I'll remember later then.
^Seems you have problems remembering things lately.
^Hah! I'm not that old, Marina. Your graceful years just come with a little imperfections.
^I could remedy that... Only if you want! Of course...
^Listen! Not a word to anyone about this, alright? I don't want anyone causing me or Tara any problems.
^Good! Then I'll... I'm not sure how this goes, actually.
^I'll just return to you with the potion.
^task:A Forgotten Duty $Jessamine $Jessamine runs that shop all by herself. Mother always tells her to let her daughter Tara help out more but Jessamine's as stubborn as an old mule.
